reviewText: this was very interesting watch the performances were outstanding and the music is mesmerizing even though you don't understand what they are saying. my two favorite performances was the girl with the hoops and the fire dance. those two numbers out did the others. great show would love to see it live sometime. if you have not seen this dvd then i recommend you do

Our family saw Alegria many years ago on Santa Monica pier. My son just took his family to Cirque Kurios so I ordered this DVD so my grandkids could see it,
